title: com.microsoft.Outlook (supplemental)
description: Preference Domain: com.microsoft.Outlook, Application: Microsoft Outlook. Supplemental properties.

AllowedEmailDomains.title: Allow only corporate mailboxes to be added
AllowedEmailDomains.description: Specify one or more domains users are allowed to add in Outlook. Format strings as regular expressions. Doesn't remove or disconnect accounts already added in Outlook.

AllowCertsWithoutMatchingEmailAddress.title: Allow S/MIME certificates without a matching email address
AllowCertsWithoutMatchingEmailAddress.description: Allow users to decrypt and encrypt S/MIME messages when the S/MIME certificate does not match the email address. Only applies to the new Outlook.

OfficeAutoSignIn.title: Automatically configure Office 365 mailbox on first launch
OfficeAutoSignIn.description: The email address used for Office activation will be added on first launch. This key also suppresses first run dialogs for other Office apps, including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote.

Weather_update_automatically.title: Disable automatic updating of weather location
Weather_update_automatically.description: Prevent users from choosing Update Location Automatically for weather location.

DisableDoNotForward.title: Disable "Do Not Forward"
DisableDoNotForward.description: Prevent users from applying the Do Not Forward option to emails when using Microsoft 365 Message Encryption. Only applies to the new Outlook.

DisableEncryptOnly.title: Disable "Encrypt-Only"
DisableEncryptOnly.description: Prevent users from applying the Encrypt-Only option to emails when using Microsoft 365 Message Encryption. Only applies to the new Outlook.

EnableNewOutlook.title: Enable new Outlook
EnableNewOutlook.description: Set the availability and default position of the New Outlook switch.

enum_titles: New Outlook enabled with switch hidden

SMIMECertificatesLookupOrder.title: Set the order in which S/MIME certificates are considered
SMIMECertificatesLookupOrder.description: Set the order in which certificates will be used to decrypt and encrypt S/MIME messages. Only applies to the new Outlook.

CalendarFirstDayOfWeek.title: Specify calendar first day of week
CalendarFirstDayOfWeek.description: Set the first day of week in calendar view.

DefaultWeatherLocation.title: Specify default weather location
DefaultWeatherLocation.description: Set default location for weather in calendar view. Use the format returned by the weather location search within Outlook.

DefaultEmailAddressOrDomain.title: Specify Office 365 mailbox to be added on first launch
DefaultEmailAddressOrDomain.description: Set the domain or full email address of Office 365 mailbox to be added on first launch. The full email address or domain specified will be added in Outlook instead of the Office activation email address.

AutomaticallyDownloadExternalContent.title: Specify when pictures are downloaded for email
AutomaticallyDownloadExternalContent.description: Set when pictures are automatically downloaded from the internet for email. Found under Outlook > Preferences > Email > Reading > Security.
